summary: Frontend adds an admin-session hook that calls `adminLogin(password)` and persists a returned token, plus attempts to validate an existing token via `validateAdminSession`. Backend changes shown set/admin-migrate the admin password to `jatinkrs01` and introduce a separate migration module, but do not show (in the provided diff summary) the required password value `JATINSHARMA2580` or clear evidence of the backend session-validation API/error messaging behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend admin password to the intended value so the admin can log in using `JATINSHARMA2580`, and ensure incorrect password fails with a clear English error message.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff explicitly sets the admin password to `jatinkrs01` (not `JATINSHARMA2580`). Also, the provided backend snippet does not show the login failure path/error message for incorrect passwords.

missing_requirements.requirement: Validate an existing `admin_session_token` via a dedicated backend validation method (e.g., `validateAdminSession`) on page load and log out if invalid/expired.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend now calls `validateAdminSession`, but the provided backend diff snippet does not show that such a dedicated validation method exists/was implemented in `backend/main.mo` (file is truncated).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a separate backend migration module/file to change `adminPassword`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify the backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister with all logic in `backend/main.mo`; adding `backend/migration.mo` and importing it adds logic outside `backend/main.mo` and was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed admin password to `jatinkrs01` (including via migration).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirement explicitly calls for password to match `JATINSHARMA2580`.
